name: Paulgriffiths.github.io
body:
### Stable Projects

* [Worms!](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/worms) --- a C language Worms game using the ncurses library
* Astronomical libraries:
    * [astro](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/astro) --- a C++ astronomical library
    * [pyastro](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/pyastro) --- a Python astronomical library
* [utctime](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/utctime) --- a C++ class for holding UTC times
* [pcards](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/pcards) --- a Python playing cards library
* [videopoker](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/videopoker) --- a Python/Tkinter video poker game
* [pridil](https://github.com/paulgriffiths/pridil) --- a C++ iterated prisoner's dilemma simulation
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
